title: Taurus

nouns: One of the constellations of the zodiac
The second sign of the zodiac; the sun is in this sign from about April 20 to May 20.
Someone with a Taurus star sign
Someone with a Taurus star sign.
The second sign of the zodiac; the sun is in this sign from about April 20 to May 20
Taurus is one of the constellations of the zodiac, which means it is crossed by the plane of the ecliptic.

description: The Taurus astrological sign in the Zodiac. This Zodiac Symbol represents a Bull.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the Taurus emoji presents a robust and stoic bull’s head, rendered with Apple’s signature 3D shading and a polished, metallic sheen. The realistic lighting accentuates the powerful horns and the determined gaze, embodying the strength and resilience associated with the zodiac sign. This emoji is commonly used to represent individuals born under the Taurus sign or to convey traits like steadfastness, loyalty, and a grounded nature.
